body:
<!-- If you need help or think you have found a bug, please help us with your issue by entering the following information (otherwise you can delete this text): -->

Output of `helm version`:

```console
$ helm version --client
Client: &version.Version{SemVer:"v2.10.0-rc.2", GitCommit:"56154102a2f25ebf679c791907fd355bb0377f05", GitTreeState:"dirty"}
```

Output of `kubectl version`:

N/A -- this is client only

Cloud Provider/Platform (AKS, GKE, Minikube etc.):  N/A

Fetch the wordpress chart: `helm fetch stable/wordpress`

```console
$ helm dep list ./wordpress-2.1.5.tgz 
NAME   	VERSION	REPOSITORY                                       	STATUS
mariadb	4.x.x  	https://kubernetes-charts.storage.googleapis.com/	missing
```

Status is `missing`. But the dependency is in the tarball. Unpack the chart, and this is evident:

```console
$ tar -zxvf wordpress-2.1.5.tgz
x wordpress/Chart.yaml
x wordpress/values.yaml
x wordpress/templates/NOTES.txt
x wordpress/templates/_helpers.tpl
x wordpress/templates/deployment.yaml
x wordpress/templates/externaldb-secrets.yaml
x wordpress/templates/ingress.yaml
x wordpress/templates/pvc.yaml
x wordpress/templates/secrets.yaml
x wordpress/templates/svc.yaml
x wordpress/templates/tests/test-mariadb-connection.yaml
x wordpress/templates/tls-secrets.yaml
x wordpress/.helmignore
x wordpress/README.md
x wordpress/requirements.lock
x wordpress/requirements.yaml
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/Chart.yaml
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/values.yaml
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/templates/NOTES.txt
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/templates/_helpers.tpl
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/templates/initialization-configmap.yaml
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/templates/master-configmap.yaml
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/templates/master-statefulset.yaml
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/templates/master-svc.yaml
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/templates/secrets.yaml
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/templates/slave-configmap.yaml
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/templates/slave-statefulset.yaml
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/templates/slave-svc.yaml
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/templates/test-runner.yaml
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/templates/tests.yaml
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/.helmignore
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/OWNERS
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/README.md
x wordpress/charts/mariadb/files/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/README.md

$ helm dep list wordpress
NAME   	VERSION	REPOSITORY                                       	STATUS
mariadb	4.x.x  	https://kubernetes-charts.storage.googleapis.com/	unpacked
```

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: bug

title: Helm Dep List is returning "missing" for deps on packaged charts
